name: Insanity (Dualsix)
description:
My game is called insanity, it goes from a person who tries to escape from his own reality and his subconscious

 doesn't let him. The theme is down to earth which means practical or realistic, 
I have used the theme as a goal for the game, in other words, the purpose of the game is to get back to reality, 
to become a realistic person, so I have used the theme as the purpose that the player has to achieve.
